Name: Self-Destruction Bug
Desc: Periodically summons 1 Self-Destruction Bug to attack the enemy.

Name: Rigid Body
Desc: Immune to damage. Removes the effect after receiving 3 attacks.

Name: Stealth
Desc: When visible, it will gain invisibility after 3s. If it is hit, it loses invisibility, and it must wait for 3s to reactivate it.

Name: Immovable
Desc: The enemy becomes immune to controls and hits.

Name: Blessing
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more the allies nearby, the higher the stacks

Name: Flash
Desc: When you are far away from the target, transfers you close to the target, CD for 8-10s. The farther the transfer distance, the shorter the CD

Name: Ice Vulnerability
Desc: Ice Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Dominator
Desc: Immune to Matrix effects

Name: Fire Vulnerability
Desc: Fire Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Protection
Desc: Grants the enemy and its nearby allies a shield equal to 10% of its current HP every 10s. Shields granted this way cannot be stacked.

Name: Nyctophobia
Desc: Dark Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Commander
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more the allies nearby, the higher the stacks

Name: Lightning Vulnerability
Desc: Lightning Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Closed Loop
Desc: A damage to the remote enemy, increases Extra DMG Reduction by 30%

Name: Berserk
Desc: Increases ATK frequency by 33%. 20% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Physical Vulnerability
Desc: Enemy Physical Resistance drops by 60%.

Name: Burning Fire
Desc: When this enemy is taken down, all their allies within 5m of it will restore 20% HP.

Name: Grudge
Desc: Enemy's attacks will reduce your team's ATK by 10%. The reduced ATK will be refunded when the enemy is taken down.

Name: Commander
Desc: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more the allies nearby, the higher the stacks

Name: Diffusion
Desc: Enemy attacks will remove 1 Signal Orb. When the enemy is taken down, it returns all Signal Orbs.

Name: Barrier
Desc: The enemy gains a shield equal to 10% of max HP and has Super Armor when the shield is active. The shield will be valid again 15s later.

Name: Recovery
Desc: Recovers 1% of max HP per second.

Name: Revenge
Desc: When this enemy is taken down, all their allies within 5m of it will gain 25% damage dealt and 5% Movement Speed. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Berserk
Desc: Increases ATK frequency by 33%. Has a 40% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Elemental Vulnerability
Desc: All Elemental Resistance decreases by 60%.

Name: Teleport
Desc: Teleport away when close to the target. Has a cooldown of 8s. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldown are calculated separately.

Name: Barrier
Desc: The enemy gains a shield equal to 30% of max HP and has Super Armor when the shield is active. The shield will be valid again 15s later.

Name: Radiation
Desc: Continuously deals 3% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Recovery
Desc: Recovers 3% of max HP per second.

Name: Revenge
Desc: The enemy will restore 20% of max HP to other enemies within 5m upon being taken down.

Name: Burning Fire
Desc: When the enemy is taken down, their allies within 5m will gain 50% ATK and 10% Movement Speed for 10s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Agility
Desc: Increases 20% - 35% movement speed. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Shield
Desc: Gains a shield with capacity equal to 10% of current HP every 10s. The shield lasts 10s.

Name: Invasion
Desc: When dealing DMG, also deals 1% Physical DMG to the target every second for 3s.

Name: Invasion
Desc: When dealing DMG, also deals 5% Physical DMG to the target every second for 3s.

Name: Lightning Shield
Desc: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 10% Lightning DMG. 3s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Deterioration
Desc: DMG dealt also reduces target's healing received by 30% for 3s.
